note.p: Occurs either SP2 or an ORA-error occurs, the job is terminated abnormally. The exit code is set to 98.

note.title: STDERR not empty
note.p: If STDERR ist not empty the exit code is set to 99.

note.title: Job exit code
note.p: The exit code of the process is the value of this parameter. The exit code is zero if the process ended without any error.
